elements.title: Punam Krishan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Punam Krishan (pictured) was raised on curry and Irn-Bru?

elements.title: Ai Uta (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Japanese girls found the song "Ai Uta" by the band Greeeen to be a perfect love song for the autumn, according to a 2007 Oricon survey?

elements.title: Margrit Waltz (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Margrit Waltz has ferried planes to points on five continents?

elements.title: Syrian literature (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that scholar Mohja Kahf stated that there is no Syrian literature?

elements.title: Edward Cruttwell (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after supervising construction of London's Tower Bridge in the 1890s, engineer Edward Cruttwell was retained as consulting engineer to the bridge until his death in 1933?

elements.title: Afonso Henriques Theatre (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Afonso Henriques Theatre in Guimarães, Portugal, regularly performed shows and plays to aid the construction of the nearby Santos Passos Church?

elements.title: Elayne Harrington (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that poet and rapper Elayne Harrington carried all her property in her bodhrán case while homeless in Dublin?

elements.title: smallest nation in the world (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Edi Rama and Baba Mondi plan to create the smallest nation in the world?

elements.title: Giorgina Reid (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Giorgina Reid patented a technique for holding up banks?
